text: priya ne dekha maan gumasum hai
raharah kar patr padhatee hai
barabas aankhon se aansoo bah nikalate hain
pyaar se maan ke paas chalee aaee
maan ke aansoo ponchhate hue poochha usane mammee kya hua kisaka patr hai
tab maan ne kaha tumhaaree deedee ka
veena deedee ka kya likha hai dev jeeja jee to theek hain
priya vyaakul ho uthee
kya theek hain vaise hee hai vahee dard vahee bistar
kaisa naseeb hai betee ka meree
vah rone lagee
chup ho jao mammee
sab theek ho jaega
priya maan kee aankhen ponchhane lagee lekin svayan usakee aankhon se aansoo tapatap bahane lage
main kya karun priya
tum bahanon ne mujhe duvidha mein daal diya hai
nirmala ne kaha
duvidha
kaisee duvidha mammee kya kiya mainne priya kee aankhen bah rahee theen
maan ke aansoo nahin dekh sakatee thee vah
ek hee baat hai betee amit ka tumase rishta
kyon mujhe aisa karane ko kahatee ho jo mere man ko manjoor nahin ho raha
mammee
yadi koee achchha lage to kya karun tumase chhipa loon priya ne kahee man kee baat
achchha to mujhe bhee lagata hai betee
lekin phir bhee man nahin maanata
nirmala kee duvidha samajh gaee priya
theek hai mammee tumhaara man nahin maanata to mana kar do
deedee ko shaadee ke baad sukh nahin mila shaayad kisee ko nahee milega isee dar ko paal kar main kabhee bhee shaadee nahin karungee
tum chinta na karo mammee main kabhee tumhaaree marjee se nahin hatoongee
kabhee nahin kahoongee ki mujhe amit se shaadee karanee hai
amit se kya kabhee kisee se shaadee ka khyaal bhee man mein nahin laoongee
bilkul sahaj hokar kaha priya ne lekin apane manobhaavon ko niyantrit nahin rakh sakee phaphakaphaphak kar rone lagee
tab nirmala sambhal gaee
pyaar se priya ka sir apanee godee mein rakh liya aur use sahalaane lagee
tum sab bahanen pagalee ho
itana bhaavuk hona bhee theek nahin
main duvidha mein hoon
meree duvidha door karogee ya mujhe aur adhik pareshaan karogee
mainne tum sabako padhaayaalikhaaya hai isalie ki badee hokar meree mitr banakar mujhe pareshaaniyon se door karane ka raasta batao na ki mere jeevan ko aur ulajha do
nirmala priya ke baalon ko sahalaate hue bole ja rahee thee amit aur tumhaaree jodee kee kalpana karatee hoon to bahut achchha lagata hai
lekin tabhee veena aur dev ka dhyaan ho aata hai
usake dukhon ko dekhakar sab bura lagane lagata hai
aur ab us pagalee ko dekho apanee koee chinta nahin use tumhaara rishta maang rahee hai amit ke lie
na jaane kis mittee kee banee hai vah
apana duhkh bhee use sukh lagata hai
priya ne sunee maan kee baat to usake aansuon kee raphtaar aur badh gaee
nirmala usake aansoo ponchhatee rahee
pyaar karatee rahee aur manaheeman kuchh sochatee rahee
geeta ko bhee priya ka phaphakana sunaee diya vah apanee padhaee chhodakar bhaagee chalee aaee
kya hua kya hua mammee priya ko kyon ro rahee hai usane priya ke paas baithate hue poochha
khushee se ro rahee hai mainne amit ke lie haan jo kah dee hai
sach mammee
munh meetha karao
geeta ne maan ko pyaar se choom liya aur priya ko gudagudaate hue bolee badee paagal hai too ekting kar rahee hai rone kee
chal hath mithaee khila
tab priya ekaek uthee aur maan se lipat gaee
nirmala bhee use pyaar karatekarate apane aansoo ponchh rahee thee
veena khush thee
amitapriya ke rishte kee maan ke mukh se haan sunakar
maan nirmala va pannaalaal donon dillee aae the
amit ko teeka karane
usaka aur usake parivaar vaalon ka munh meetha karane
maan nirmala ne tab amit ko yahee kaha tha beta man ko samajhaaya hai mainne tumhe dekhakar
yahee tamanna hai ki mere jigar ke tukade ko tum khush rakhoge
priya ke saathasaath meree veena ka dhyaan tumhen rakhana hai
jaanatee hoon veena tumhen prem jaise apana bhaee maanatee hai
usako koee kasht na ho yah dhyaan rakhana tum
tumase milakar tumase baat karake jaane kaunasee adrshyashakti ne tumase mera bandhan jod diya hai
itana kuchh ho jaane ke baad bhee tumase aisa lagata hai hamaara pichhale janm ka koee sambandh hai
aise mein mujhe lagata hai mera prem ek nahin do hain
maan nirmala kee baat sunakar amit kee aankhen chhalak uthee theen
use apanee maan ka doosara roop hee lagee nirmala
yah bandhan baandha tha priya ke prati usake man mein aa base pyaar ne ya phir yah bandhan vaastav mein koee pichhale janm ke sambandh kee or ishaara karata tha
priya ke parivaar ne ek bhanvar mein svayan ko paakar bhee amit ke astitv ko us bhanvar se alag maan liya tha
aaj dev ka sambandh us parivaar se jaise sirph daamaad ka tha aur amit ka ek bete se badhakar
vah maan nirmala ke paanv chhookar itana hee kah saka  mujhe bhee aisa lagata hai mammee ki jaise devaveena ka milan mere aur priya ke milan ke kaaran hee hua
yah vaastav mein kisee aur rishte kee kisee aur kartavy kee or ishaara karata hai
aap nishchint rahen
bhaabhee ke chehare par main kabhee shikan na aane doonga
shesh sab eeshvar par nirbhar karata hai
yah bhaavanaon kee baaten kitanee satyata lie hotee hain isaka pata to sab sach saamane aane par hee pata chalata hai
tab tak ham keval achchhe kee kaamana hee kar sakate hain
kal jo bhee hoga achchha hee hoga
udhar dev ko mana liya veena ne rediyotharaipee ke lie
dev ne bhee tark karana chhod diya tha
jo karegee veena karegee
vah usakee har baat ka paalan karega
daanyee taang apanee dev ko kabheekabhee patthar kee banee lagane lagee thee
aise mein doktar kumaar ke paas jaane ko vah maan gaya
doktar bhee samajh raha tha usakee maanasik sthiti ko
iseelie test ke teenamaheene baad bhee dev ko usee garmajoshee se mila
achchhee tarah muaayana karake usane usaka kes kainsar vibhaag mein sthaanaantarit kar diya
vahee aage ilaaj kee sochenge
agale hee din ka samay lekar vah ghar laut aae
veena ka man vaise bhee dev kee dekhabhaal ke atirikt aur kaheen nahin lagata tha
usakee ek hee tamanna thee ki dev theek ho jae
isee kee kaamana mein vah har dam lagee rahatee thee
agale din vah dev ke saath aims jaane ko huee to usase bolee  ham donon akele hee jaenge
amit ko nahin le jaana
kyon aisee kya baat hai  dev ko aashchary hua usakee baat sunakar
aap jara sochie vah apana kaamadhandha bhool kar hamaare saath laga rahata hai
isase usake kaam ko kitana asar pad raha hai
vaise bhee usaka koee kaam to hota nahin siva apanee kaar mein hamen dhone ke ya phir aapakee davaee laane ke
vah mana nahin karata lekin hamen to sochana chaahie
usake bhavishy ke baare mein
veena kahe ja rahee thee  meree to yahee raay hai ham donon hee jaen
mujhe khushee bhee hogee aur lagega ki main kisee ko vyarth mein pareshaan nahin kar rahee
veena ne man kee baat kahee dev se
vah amit ke vishay mein bhee chintit rahane lagee thee
aisa kyon kah rahee ho tum hee to mera khyaal rakhatee ho
mainne to tumhen koee sukh nahin diya lekin tumane to mujhe har khushee dee hai
mera saath shaayad aur koee itana na nibhaata jo pichhale dedh saal se tumane nibhaaya hai
phir ham donon hee jaenge akele
yadi kabhee jaroorat huee tabhee amit ko kahenge saath chalane ke lie
veena ne kaha use
yahee ichchha hai usakee yah sochakar dev ne kaha  achchha jaisa tum theek samajho
yah kah kar dev taiyaar hone laga
doktar sinha se dev apana chaikap karavaane gaya
doktar sinha ne dev kee saaree riport padhee
padhakar gambheerata se kuchh sochate rahe
unhonne dev ka achchhee tarah se nireekshan kiya
phir dev ko dekhate hue bole ab kya phaayada rediyotharaipee ka saaree davaen bekaar hain
mushkil se shesh bache din bhee takaleeph mein gujarenge rediyotharaipee ke baad
aap soch leejie
koee laabh nahin hoga
vaise bhee gujara vakt to haath aata nahin
jo din hain unhen hanseekhushee se bitaie
veena ka jee chaaha rone lage aur doktar ko khoob gaaliyaan nikaale
kya yahee tareeka rah gaya hai mareej ko dilaasa dene ka
itanee seedhee baat
lekin dev tha samajhadaar veena ke bhaavon ko samajh chuka tha isase pahale ki veena kuchh bolatee vahee bol pada doktar se  lekin himmat haar kar baith jaane se kuchh hoga kya doktar
himmat haarane ko kaun kahata hai main to kah raha hoon ki peedaadaayak upachaar se kuchh phaayada nahin hoga
haan nukasaan itana jaroor hoga ki tum jo abhee oopar se bhalechange dikhate ho vah nahin dikhoge
abhee chalate ho shaayad nahin chal sakoge
dil mat haaro
lekin aisa ilaaj bhee na karavao ki khade rahane ke kaabil aaj ho saalachhah maheene aur rahoge usase bhee jao
tum padhe likhe ho
sab samajhate ho iseelie mainne tumase kuchh nahin chhipaaya
varana to main likh deta kal se hee tumhaara upachaar shuroo ho jaega
yah kahakar doktar ne apanee baat samaapt kar dee
nahin shaayad aap theek kahate hain
dev aage kuchh na bol saka  mujhe phir aana hai kya doktar
aise to aane kee jaroorat nahin
rediyotharaipee karavaana chaaho to beshak chale aana
haan tab ham tumhen bhartee kar lenge taaki shaareerik kasht kam se kam ho
aisa kab hoga
dekho
tum jaise kaee kes aae hain mere paas
dekha hai mainne isee tarah kaee rogee kaee varsh gujaar dete hain
dard hoga kabheekabhee
lekin chalata rahega
ho sakata hai ek varsh ho sakata hai ek maheena aur ho sakata hai das varsh
isaka matalab hai ki mere sir par latakee yah talavaar ab kab giregee pata nahin
dev ne kaha
haan tumhen kab se dubaara yah hua isaka pata nahin
ho sakata hai tumhaara opareshan hone ke samay hee koee keetaanu shesh rah gaya ho tumhaare shareer ke kisee hisse mein
jo ab panapane laga ho
ho sakata hai parason se hee shurooaat huee ho
doktar bahut hee spashtavaadee tha
theek hai doktar chalata hoon
dev uth khada hua
doktar sinha ne usase haath milaaya
veena ne usase namaskaar kee
chalatechalate doktar sinha ne kaha eeshvar par bharosa rakho bas aur koshish jaaree rakho
veena baahar nikalee to apane aansoo na rok paee
chup thee lekin aansoo aviral bahe ja rahe the
kis mittee kee banee thee ki phaphakana bhool chukee thee
doktar eeshvar par bharosa rakhane ko bhee kah raha tha aur svayan ilaaj karane se bhee katara raha tha
dev ne himmat nahin haaree
usaka utsaah dekhakar veena ne bhee apane ko sambhaal liya
dev ka kolej jaana bahut kam ho gaya tha
kolej ke sabhee saathiyon ne aise mein usakee madad kee
usake sabhee lekchar sabane aapas mein baant lie the
prinsipal bhee sahayogee the
unhonne bhee aapatti nahin kee
dev jab kabhee aata ek aadh ghanta staaph room mein aaraam karata
sahayogiyon ka haalachaal poochhata aur vaapis ghar chala jaata
veena usee ke saath rahatee thee
aisee haalat mein dev ko kabhee bhee mahasoos nahin hua ki kaheen kuchh panap raha hai bheetar aur usake jeevan par ek talavaar latak rahee hai
veena ko apanee naukaree kee ab chinta nahin thee
badalee huee nahin to ab tyaagapatr bhej diya tha
pramod tha ki roj shaam ko dev ke paas aane laga tha
aise mein ek din usane kaha  dev ghar baithane se kuchh nahin hoga
aims vaalon ne javaab diya hai to isaka matalab yah nahin ki kuchh nahin raha shesh
tum bambee jao aur taata insteetyoot mein dikhao apane ko
ho sakata hai ve kuchh aur tarah se raasta sujha kar ilaaj karen
main bhee yahee sochata hoon phir ruk jaata hoon kuchh sochakar
vahaan gaya to saare upachaar ka kharch itana adhik hoga ki amit ke lie kathinaee hogee
mere paas to kuchh bacha nahin aur amit hee hai jo kisee tarah se meree har jaroorat ka dhyaan rakhata hai
davaeeyon ka kharch itana hai ki meree tanakhvaah usee mein nikal jaatee hai
kolej se jo medikal ka kharch milata hai vah bhee yoon hee nipat jaata hai
lekin ab yah tumhaare sochane ka samay nahin hai
amit mana nahin karega
aur phir use takaleeph huee to main yoonivarsitee mein tumhaare ilaaj ke lie phand ikattha karoonga
pramod ne kaha
dekho pramod mujhe mar jaana pasand hai lekin main madad kee bheekh kisee se nahin maangooga
main man hee man kitana kudhata hoon jab amit se kabhee paise maangane padate hain
usakee tarakkee mein baadhak bana
hua hoon
jo paise vah meree beemaaree par laga raha hai vahee vah apane bijanes mein lagaata to kitanee aur tarakkee kar leta
dev ke aansoo bahane lage the
tabhee amit ghar aa gaya
pramod ko aaya dekhakar vah seedha dev ke kamare mein chala aaya
aate hee usane dev kee aankhon se aansoo nikalate dekhe
kya hua dev  usane poochha
dev ne kuchh uttar nahin diya
tab usane veena se poochha
vah bhee chup rahee
aansoo aankhon se tapakane lage the usakee
tab pramod ne kaha  kuchh vishesh nahin main ise samajha raha tha bambee jaane ke lie
abhee pramod kuchh aur kahata ki amit bol utha  haan yah to achchhee baat hai
main chalane kee taiyaaree karata hoon lekin vahaan aspataal jaakar seedha ilaaj ho jaldee se isake lie koee jaanakaar dhoondhana hoga
lekin kharcha bhee bahut aaega
tab dev ne kaha
tab amit samajh gaya dev ke aansooon ka arth
bola  are ab samajha
lekin isamen rone kee baat kya hai kharcha aaega to sah lenge
kitana aaega das bees pachaas hajaar ek laakh main sab juta loonga
aap koee jaanakaar dhoondhiye jo hamaaree madad kar sake aur tay keejie kab chalana hai
tab dev ne kaha  usake lie tumhen mistar garg se milana hoga
vah hamaaree sanstha kee bambee shaakha ke kisee varishth sadasy ke naam patr likh denge
main aaj hee unase mil leta hoon aur kal subah tikat bhee le aaoonga
amit ekadam utsaahit tha tabhee jaise use kuchh dhyaan aaya bola  tren mein jaane se pareshaanee hogee ham baee eyar jaenge
amit kuchh der aur baitha raha
idharudhar kee baaten hone lageen
veena usake lie chaay bana laee aur chaay peekar vah mistar garg se milane chala gaya
teen din baad ke tikat mile aur yah sanyog hee tha ki jaane se ek din pahale ramesh kumaar ka phon aaya ki usakee badalee gova se bambee ho gaee hai
amit ne tab use vistaar se dev kee sthiti se avagat karavaaya aur apane bambee aane ke prograam ke vishay mein bata diya
tab ramesh ne kaha ki vah unake lie rahane ka koee na koee prabandh kar lega
ve seedhe eyaraport se kolaaba sthit nevee mes mein aa jaen
ramesh kumaar kee bambee mein upasthiti sunakar dev bhee khush ho gaya
